mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APPROVAL VALUES (SEQ_APPROVAL.NEXTVAL, null, DEFAULT, #{foNo}, #{cNo}, #{dNo}, #{mNo})
INSERT INTO DAYOFF_FORM VALUES (SEQ_DAYOFF_FORM.NEXTVAL, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd'), #{doTitle}, #{doStartDate}, #{doEndDate}, #{doContent}, SEQ_APPROVAL.CURRVAL, #{foNo}, #{mNo}, #{doType})

INSERT INTO PROPOSAL_FORM VALUES (SEQ_PROPOSAL_FORM.NEXTVAL, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd'), #{prTitle}, #{prGoal}, #{prPlan}, #{prStartDate}, #{prEndDate}, #{prPerson}, #{prAmount}, SEQ_APPROVAL.CURRVAL, #{foNo}, #{mNo})
INSERT INTO PAYMENT_FORM VALUES (SEQ_PAYMENT_FORM.NEXTVAL, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd'), #{payTitle}, #{payDay}, #{payList}, #{payAmount}, SEQ_APPROVAL.CURRVAL, #{foNo}, #{mNo})
mapper.select: SELECT A.M_NO, A.M_NAME, B.D_NAME, C.J_NAME FROM MEMBER A JOIN DEPT B ON A.D_NO = B.D_NO JOIN JOB C ON A.J_NO = C.J_NO WHERE A.M_WORK = 'Y' AND A.C_NO = #{cNo} AND A.M_NAME = #{searchName} ORDER BY A.M_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPROVAL WHERE AP_STATUS IS NULL

SELECT B.AP_NO, B.FO_NO, B.DO_TITLE, B.DO_DATE, A.M_NO, A.C_NO, A.AP_STATUS FROM APPROVAL A JOIN DAYOFF_FORM B ON A.AP_NO= B.AP_NO WHERE A.AP_NO = B.AP_NO AND A.AP_STATUS IS NULL AND A.STATUS = 'Y' AND A.M_NO = #{mNo} AND A.C_NO = #{cNo} UNION SELECT C.AP_NO, C.FO_NO, C.PR_TITLE, C.PR_DATE, A.M_NO, A.C_NO, A.AP_STATUS FROM APPROVAL A JOIN PROPOSAL_FORM C ON A.AP_NO = C.AP_NO WHERE A.AP_NO = C.AP_NO AND A.AP_STATUS IS NULL AND A.STATUS = 'Y' AND A.M_NO = #{mNo} AND A.C_NO = #{cNo} UNION SELECT D.AP_NO, D.FO_NO, D.PAY_TITLE, D.PAY_DATE, A.M_NO, A.C_NO, A.AP_STATUS FROM APPROVAL A JOIN PAYMENT_FORM D ON A.AP_NO = D.AP_NO WHERE A.AP_NO = D.AP_NO AND A.AP_STATUS IS NULL AND A.STATUS = 'Y' AND A.M_NO = #{mNo} AND A.C_NO = #{cNo}
SELECT B.M_NAME, C.J_NAME FROM APPROVAL_LINE A JOIN MEMBER B ON A.APLINE_NO = B.M_NO JOIN JOB C ON B.J_NO = C.J_NO WHERE A.AP_NO = #{apNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPROVAL A JOIN APPROVAL_LINE B ON A.AP_NO = B.AP_NO WHERE B.AP_NO = #{apNo} AND B.APLINE_STATUS IS NOT NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPROVAL A JOIN APPROVAL_LINE B ON A.AP_NO = B.AP_NO WHERE A.STATUS = 'Y' AND B.APLINE_NO = #{mNo}

SELECT B.AP_NO, B.FO_NO, B.DO_TITLE, B.DO_DATE, A.M_NO, A.C_NO, A.AP_STATUS FROM APPROVAL A JOIN DAYOFF_FORM B ON A.AP_NO= B.AP_NO JOIN APPROVAL_LINE C ON A.AP_NO = C.AP_NO WHERE A.AP_NO = B.AP_NO AND A.AP_STATUS IS NULL AND A.STATUS = 'Y' AND A.C_NO = #{cNo} AND C.APLINE_NO = #{mNo} UNION SELECT C.AP_NO, C.FO_NO, C.PR_TITLE, C.PR_DATE, A.M_NO, A.C_NO, A.AP_STATUS FROM APPROVAL A JOIN PROPOSAL_FORM C ON A.AP_NO = C.AP_NO JOIN APPROVAL_LINE C ON A.AP_NO = C.AP_NO WHERE A.AP_NO = C.AP_NO AND A.AP_STATUS IS NULL AND A.STATUS = 'Y' AND A.C_NO = #{cNo} AND C.APLINE_NO = #{mNo} UNION SELECT D.AP_NO, D.FO_NO, D.PAY_TITLE, D.PAY_DATE, A.M_NO, A.C_NO, A.AP_STATUS FROM APPROVAL A JOIN PAYMENT_FORM D ON A.AP_NO = D.AP_NO JOIN APPROVAL_LINE C ON A.AP_NO = C.AP_NO WHERE A.AP_NO = D.AP_NO AND A.AP_STATUS IS NULL AND A.STATUS = 'Y' AND A.C_NO = #{cNo} AND C.APLINE_NO = #{mNo}
SELECT A.M_NAME, B.D_NAME FROM MEMBER A JOIN DEPT B ON A.D_NO = B.D_NO JOIN APPROVAL C ON A.M_NO = C.M_NO WHERE C.AP_NO = #{apNo}
